name: #0 winter
description:
This is the second version of a series of Computational Fluid Dynamics collections. In this version, we utilize Athena++, which is an open-source finite-volume, magnetohydrodynamics code (further details in Stone et al. 2020, ApJ, 249, 4).

In this version, we simulate an Orszag-Tang vortex which is a classical test problem to ensure vanishing divergence of the magnetic field is maintained in a complicated flow structure. Athena++ utilizes the constrained transport method to guarantee the solenoidal constraint of Maxwell's equations is zero to machine precision throughout the simulations.

Simulations were performed on a 2013 MacBook Pro (2 GHz Quad-Core Intel Core i7; 8 GB 1600 MHz DDR3).

v2.0.0 features 32 NFTs.
